SELECT CONCAT('user_',_COOPER4_USER._USERID) AS id, _COOPER4_USER._USERNAME AS text, CONCAT('dept_',#{node}) AS parentId, '1' AS leaf, 'userIcon' AS iconCls, _COOPER4_USER_ROLE._ROLEID AS roleId FROM _COOPER4_USER LEFT JOIN _COOPER4_USER_ROLE ON _COOPER4_USER_ROLE._USERID = _COOPER4_USER._USERID WHERE _COOPER4_USER._DEPTID = #{node} AND _COOPER4_USER._STATUS = 1 AND _COOPER4_USER._LOCKED = 0
_COOPER4_USER._USERTYPE = 2

SELECT _COOPER4_ROLE._ROLEID AS id, _COOPER4_ROLE._ROLENAME AS text, 1 AS parentId, 1 AS leaf, '' AS iconCls, _COOPER4_USER_ROLE._USERID AS userId FROM _COOPER4_ROLE LEFT JOIN _COOPER4_USER_ROLE ON _COOPER4_USER_ROLE._ROLEID = _COOPER4_ROLE._ROLEID WHERE _COOPER4_ROLE._STATUS = 1
AND _COOPER4_ROLE._ROLETYPE = 2
AND _COOPER4_ROLE._EDITMODE = 1

SELECT CONCAT('menu_',_COOPER4_MENU._MENUID) AS id, _COOPER4_MENU._MENUNAME AS text, CONCAT('menu_',_COOPER4_MENU._PARENTID) AS parentId, _COOPER4_MENU._LEAF AS leaf, _COOPER4_MENU._ICONCLS AS iconCls, _COOPER4_ROLE_MENU._ROLEID AS roleId FROM _COOPER4_MENU LEFT JOIN _COOPER4_ROLE_MENU ON _COOPER4_ROLE_MENU._MENUID = _COOPER4_MENU._MENUID WHERE _COOPER4_MENU._PARENTID = #{node} AND _COOPER4_MENU._STATUS = 1
AND _COOPER4_MENU._MENUTYPE = 2
ORDER BY _COOPER4_MENU._SORTNO ,_COOPER4_MENU._MENUID ASC
